trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref>.
Returns the strokes that are a result of the eraser path erasing a stroke.

The GetPointEraseResults method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains the strokes that result in the eraser path erasing the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A> where they intersect.

If the eraser path intersects the middle of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke%2A>, the GetPointEraseResults method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains two new strokes.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the strokes that are created after the eraser path erases part of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs.HitStroke*>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that is intersected by the eraser path.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that is intersected by the eraser path.
